statements.sql: select count(*) as aggregate from `ideas` where `ideas`.`user_id` = 4 and `ideas`.`user_id` is not null

select `ideas`.*, (select count(*) from `users` inner join `idea_like` on `users`.`id` = `idea_like`.`user_id` where `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id`) as `likes_count` from `ideas` where `ideas`.`user_id` = 4 and `ideas`.`user_id` is not null order by `created_at` desc limit 3 offset 0
select count(*) as aggregate from `users` inner join `follower_user` on `users`.`id` = `follower_user`.`follower_id` where `follower_user`.`user_id` = 4
select count(*) as aggregate from `ideas` where `ideas`.`user_id` = 4 and `ideas`.`user_id` is not null
select count(*) as aggregate from `comments` where `comments`.`user_id` = 4 and `comments`.`user_id` is not null
select count(*) as aggregate from `ideas` inner join `idea_like` on `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id` where `idea_like`.`user_id` = 4
select exists(select * from `users` inner join `follower_user` on `users`.`id` = `follower_user`.`user_id` where `follower_user`.`follower_id` = 1 and `user_id` = 4) as `exists`

select exists(select `ideas`.*, (select count(*) from `users` inner join `idea_like` on `users`.`id` = `idea_like`.`user_id` where `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id`) as `likes_count` from `ideas` inner join `idea_like` on `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id` where `idea_like`.`user_id` = 1 and `idea_id` = 16) as `exists`

select exists(select `ideas`.*, (select count(*) from `users` inner join `idea_like` on `users`.`id` = `idea_like`.`user_id` where `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id`) as `likes_count` from `ideas` inner join `idea_like` on `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id` where `idea_like`.`user_id` = 1 and `idea_id` = 12) as `exists`

select exists(select `ideas`.*, (select count(*) from `users` inner join `idea_like` on `users`.`id` = `idea_like`.`user_id` where `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id`) as `likes_count` from `ideas` inner join `idea_like` on `ideas`.`id` = `idea_like`.`idea_id` where `idea_like`.`user_id` = 1 and `idea_id` = 11) as `exists`
